title: HKRN Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 1000 Ground Coordinator Posts
description: Haryana Kaushal Rozgar Nigam (HKRN) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Ground Coordinator Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, 12th can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the HKRN Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last dat...
